p.k: Ben goes Upgrade to get a better signal to watch his favourite show Xingo but the titular Xingo leaps from his animated dimension to ours – bringing mad chaos with him! / After the Rust Bucket breaks down at a Mobile Home Park, Ben discovers they’ve stumbled on to the last leg of the Cali 10 Hundred, an epic off-road auto race. / When the Rust Bucket runs out of gas on a foggy East Coast road Ben Gwen and Max are forced to stay at hotel being menaced by Creepy Carl. / Ben is attacked by Dr. Animo mutants. When they realize the faux mini-golf village they are at isn’t an actual town, Ben must stop them before they see the real city down the road. / Ben, Gwen and Max make a return to Max's alma-mater but this time it's no homecoming.
